Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a light-red coloured pottery wine-jar, interior slightly grooved, with faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text on the exterior, now partially obscured by salt action.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389884) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389884)
